title: Gorgeous 2-bedroom apartment in University City
description:
Don't miss this beautiful, 2-Bedroom 1-Bathroom apartment located in University City at only $695per person. This new construction includes granite countertops, security camera, washer/dryer, and dishwasher. Both bedrooms feature big closets and natural light. Enjoy the large, private backyard, and on street parking. This apartment is located close to bus, subway and trolley stops, as well as UPenn, Drexel, the Philadelphia Zoo. Only half a mile from University of Penn and Penn Presbyterian Medical Center, and less than a mile away from Drexel! This apartment is perfect for students or young professionals in a great location. Other amenities include hardwood floors, stainless steel appliances. Have a small dog or cat? No problem! this unit is dog and cat friendly.
Owner pays for water. Renter responsible for electric. Small pets are allowed :)

title: 27F grad student looking for roommate near Penn campus
description:
Hi!
1 bedroom only for sublease in a 2 bed/1 bath in University City. ~20 minute walk from Penn's campus near Supremo and Fine Wine.
- $800 + utilities (~$60/month)
- Washer/dryer in unit
- Newly (last 2-3 years) renovated
- Shared kitchen/bathroom supplies
- Bedroom is unfurnished except the desk (unless you don't want it)
Looking for a roommate ASAP! I'm a 27 year old Taurus finishing up her PhD sometime in the spring. More of a night owl, generally clean (tidy in public spaces) and living with 2 cats. I enjoy cooking, going out for food/museums/music shows, cozy nights, and self-help and spirituality-related books and podcasts.
BACKGROUND CHECK REQUIRED: must have a 650 or higher credit score

title: 2bd/1.5ba
description: Live at 2145 Percy St, located in North Philadelphia. This newly updated home features 2 spacious bedrooms and one and a half brand new bathrooms with gorgeous subway tile! The kitchen includes new white shaker cabinets, ample cabinet/counter space, and brand-new stainless steel appliances installed prior to move-in. The rooms are bright and open, with tons of storage space and windows. The bedrooms are quite spacious, featuring large closets and large windows that let tons of natural light in. Best of all enjoy central air for comfort during hot days. Be the first to live in this beautifully refinished home!

title: You'll Fall In Love With All The Charming Details In This 4B Unit!!
description:
Beautiful 4B/2B apartment! This unit offers a private entrance to newly renovated unit. Modern kitchen with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances. Newly ceramic tile floors and carpeted bedrooms. Four spacious bedrooms, all with great closet space. Some rooms offer a "bonus room" which can be used as an office or additional storage. Some bedrooms offer walk-in closets. Individually controlled central heating and air conditioning. Unit includes washer/dryer. Cats are welcome (add'l fee)! Apartment is rented unfurnished.
Chancellor Apartments is a convenient high rise apartment community in an amazing location in Center City. We are close to most major schools and universities, public transportation, historical attractions, shopping, restaurants and theaters. Center City at its best!!
Rent includes: Water, 24-hour front desk attendant, free bike storage room, package acceptance service, 24-hour emergency maintenance service, BuildingLink resident services portal access for all residents.
The Chancellor boasts several different studio and one bedroom floor plans. Apartments feature high ceilings, large bright windows, ceiling fans in most units, hardwood floors and breathtaking views of the Philadelphia skyline and Delaware River. Many apartments have large walk-in closets, too!
We have partnered with Optimal Sport Health Club to offer a generous discounted gym membership (we pay your initiation fee!). There are several off street parking lots and garages in the area, too!

title: Enjoy space, luxury and convenience at the Ellington
description:
Enjoy space, luxury and convenience at the Ellington. This is one of the larger one bedroom floor plans in the building. The living and dining areas offer soaring ceiling heights, oversized windows, and gorgeous Brazilian cherry hardwood floors. The kitchen with breakfast bar is top of the line. POGGENPOHL cabinets are complemented by stainless steel appliances, KOHLER fixtures and CAPAO BONITO granite countertops. The bedroom is generously proportioned, and the spa-like bathroom boasts White GIOIA marble tile flooring, designer chrome fixtures and a ceramic sink with storage vanity. Rent includes central air and heating, water and sewer, a 24 hour concierge, on-site fitness center, and residents' lounge. Convenient valet parking is available adjacent to the building in a public garage for an additional fee. Live in the most prestigious and stylish of neighborhoods. Perfectly situated in the Rittenhouse and Avenue of the Arts area, this home is steps away from fine dining, one-of-a-kind shopping, world-renowned cultural destinations and exciting nightlife. The campuses of Penn and Drexel, 30th Street Station and major hospitals are all minutes away.
1500 Chestnut St #16D

title: Come and see this amazing space at CItyView
description:
Come and see this amazing space at CItyView. This Penthouse Unit is certain to impress you. CityView is one of the most popular communities in Center City Philadelphia. The list of amenities goes on and on but here are some: 24 hour security, doorman / concierge service, covered parking available, outdoor garden and pool, world class fitness center, library, and a beautiful lobby with amazing staff, This unit is located on the Penthouse Level. Inside is an open floor plan. The living room, dining room, and kitchen all share stunning views of the city. The kitchen is modern with oak cabinets, stone counters, modern appliances, and recessed lighting. The living room, dining room combo offers two separate spaces in an open layout. Both bedrooms have a private bath and provide amazing city views. Both bathrooms are modern ceramic tile baths, one with a tub, and one with an enclosed stall shower. Additional features include hardwood floors, individual heating and cooling units in each room, private covered parking spot, off street guest parking, walking distance to Whole Foods shopping, and laundry with a stackable washer and dryer.
2001 Hamilton St #P407

description:

Located in the heart of Graduate Hospital, situated amongst the dining and community gathering spaces that make this neighborhood one of Philly's most desireable, is a gorgeous 3 story brick-front townhome. An open floor plan and wide layout greets you as you enter this sophisticated, light-filled open concept living/dining space. The space enjoys an abundance of natural light owing to two west facing windows. The contemporary style pairs neutral walls with rich dark hardwood floors, and cabinetry, and shows off a grand white Quartz island with a striking waterfall feature. If a glamorous kitchen is what you’re looking for, you will be pleased with the newly renovated custom chef’s kitchen which is designed with generous storage space, specialized knife, spice and kitchen-tool drawers as well as hidden panel built-in garbage and recycling storage. If creating a welcoming space for family and visitors is your goal, the oversized island seats 5 comfortably and is perfect for entertaining or for casual family meals in the kitchen. Stainless steel appliances include a counter depth, side-by-side refrigerator, a 5-burner gas range, range hood and a dishwasher designed to disappear behind a cabinet panel. The second level of the home features wainscoting in the hallway along with two bedrooms plus a shared 3-piece bathroom. Both bedrooms are spacious and feature hardwood floors and ample closets. The hall bath features a tub/shower combo, plus a modern vanity, matching mirror and ample storage closet. The third floor is the primary suite level with an open plan to include a den/home office, perfect for working from home, or also perfect to finish as a nursery for a growing family. This room is also finished with wainscoting for a unique look. The bedroom area features high ceilings, hardwood floors, two windows, a large french door style double closet and an additional single closet with built-in shelving/storage. The private primary bathroom has a bathtub along with a separate stall shower, vanity and a third storage closet. Need more living space or a bonus room? The fully finished lower level is the perfect bonus space which can be used as a family room, exercise room, or additional guest space. It also features a convenient powder room. The home also has a rear patio, perfect for a bistro table and BBQ grill. Add some planters and enjoy your private city garden. With a WalkScore of 96, this home is within a short stroll to amazing Graduate Hospital destinations. It's located blocks from Julian Abel park, Chester Arthur School and a short walk from the many neighborhood restaurants, bars, coffee shops, and grocery stores. Easy access to public transportation, South Street, nearby Rittenhouse Square, and the Schuylkill River Trail. Sorry, no pets. No smoking.
759 S 22nd St

title: MODERN FINISHES, SKYLINE VIEWS AND AN INCREDIBLE LOCATION!
description:
Welcome to 815 Perkiomen St #15! Dare we say the home that has EVERYTHING?! Just imagine ... garage parking, two outdoor spaces, modern finishes, skyline views and an incredible location! Located in the heart of Francisville/Fairmount, Perkiomen St is perfectly situated just blocks from the best shops and restaurants Fairmount Ave has to offer as well as the newly completed Francisville Playground and minutes from Fairmount Park and the Schuylkill river. Pull right in to your private one car garage and enter the stylish foyer with full coat closet and half bath for convenience. Heading upstairs to the main living level, one is immediately struck by the hardwood flooring and abundance of natural light flooding in from either side. The open concept kitchen provides the ideal space for the chef of the house. Upgraded stainless steel appliances, designer cabinetry and expansive white quartz waterfall island creates a useful but stylish space. Finishing off this level is a quaint balcony off of the kitchen. Making ones way up the floating stairs, the next level has two generous bedrooms with built-in closet systems and a stylishly tiled full bath. The primary suite level is the perfect getaway with a large main room, fully built-in walk in closet, attached bath with expansive glass shower and dual sinks. Lastly, the roof deck provides unobstructed, jaw dropping skyline views as well as a built-in gas grill and comfortable sectional furniture! If you're looking for garage parking, two outdoor spaces, modern finishes, skyline views and an incredible location 1815 Perkiomen St #15 is a must see! Schedule an appointment today! Home is available February 1st, 2023.
815 Perkiomen St #15

title: CENTER CITY PHILADELPHIA APT NEAR RITTENHOUSE SQ BE A PART OF HISTORY
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments Near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on theÃ‚Â National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment nearÃ‚Â Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors.Ã‚Â Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & BoxingÃ‚Â . Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media RoomÃ‚Â . Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. Cold Storage for Grocery Delivery. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance. Pets Welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. On-Site Green Drop Donation Box. ** Pricing and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** Photos are of model units ** Parking may be available for additional fee **

Welcome to 125 Cuthbert Street, Unit B! This beautiful two-bedroom, one-bath condo is located on a picturesque cobblestone street in the heart of Old City, Philadelphia. Enter this boutique building to a charming and newly renovated lobby and make your way to this unit occupying the entire second floor. Be greeted by hardwood floors and an abundance of natural light in this open concept living/dining room complete with wainscoting, built-in bookcases and even a fireplace! The recently upgraded kitchen features gas appliances. Down the hallway are two bedrooms, a fully renovated bathroom and a brand new stackable washer and dryer. The unit has been completely painted in a warm and neutral tone. Landlord pays water. Tenant responsible for gas, electric and cable (if desired). Available immediately. Pets welcome on a case by case basis and for a small deposit.
125 Cuthbert St #B

title: Charming 2 Bed, 2 Full Bath in One of the Most Desirable Neighborhood!
description:
Tucked away on a quiet, tree-lined street in the heart of Queen Village sits a historic and charming 2 bed, 2 full bath in one of the most desirable neighborhoods in the city. A tiled foyer greets you as you enter the open living and dining room with hardwood floors through out and plenty of light. The spacious and bright kitchen is a perfect mix of cottage sensibility and function with its reclaimed wood shelving, white subway tile and butcher block counter tops. Backdoor leads to a cozy patio ideal for grilling and potted plants. Make your way upstairs where you’ll find the first of two large bedrooms plus a second-floor den with enough space to accommodate an additional entertainment room or perhaps a WFH office. A full bath and large closet for linens and additional storage round out this floor. The third floor features a primary suite with generous closet space, full 3-piece bath and a roof deck retreat for an evening with friends or quiet mornings with a cup of coffee. 516 Kauffman St is a commuter friendly home being close to public transportation and I95 and is steps away from neighborhood treasures like Shot Tower Coffee, Moon + Arrow, Bus Stop Boutique and Essene Market.
516 Kauffman St

title: Beautiful Spacious 3Bed/2.5Bath Double Wide
description:
Congratulations! You just hit the jackpot. You happened to stumble upon one of the few houses available that will actually exceed your expectations! I have for rent a GIGANTIC and amazing 3 bedroom/2.5 bathroom house in an amazing location, just shy of 2,00 square feet. What makes this place so amazing? First go grab yourself a cup of coffee or a beer because it will take an eternity to describe how epic this place is. Let me start by listing a few of the local perks:
Location. Location. Location. That's what they say right? The closest cross streets are Coral Street and Dauphin Street. I'm struggling on where to start to describe all the awesome things around here, there are so many places to list. Walking distance to two stops on the El (perfect if you work anywhere downtown). Like to enjoy the night life or a beer here and there? Once again you've just hit the jackpot. A quick walk down to places like Frankford Hall, Johnny Brenda's, Barcade, Bottle Bar East..etc. etc. Those are just a quick walk!
Want to know what you could literally crawl to? Within crawling distance are amazing spots like Loco Pez, Cedar Point, York Street Tavern, Luke's Bar, Memphis Taproom, Bob's Happy Hour, Philadelphia Brewing Company, Atlantis, annnnd the list goes on! Are you a foodie? Yet again, jackpot. The list could go on forever so I'll save you the time.
The Piazza....you can walk there, it takes about 10 minutes. If you aren't familiar with The Piazza and EVERYTHING it has to offer, let me fill you in. This place is a constant stream of entertainment. Concerts, sports, restaurants, bars, food trucks, street fairs, everything under the sun. You can also check out their website, just Google The Piazza.
Parking. One of the biggest problems in the city is trying to find a parking spot. You can drive around for an hour sometimes looking for a spot, and even if you find one you run the risk of not having the right parking pass....such a hassle! Guess what?! No parking passes needed throughout the entire neighborhood, and on top of that the furthest I've had to park away was about a block, with typical parking right outside of the house!
The Neighborhood. People in the neighborhood are extremely nice. A good mix of ages and ethnicities, and in general, just amazing people. All of the neighbors look out for each other and they definitely make you feel at home.
The House. This place is great! Built in 2012, and recently went through a six month restoration. Full amenities, including a gas range, dual oven, dishwasher, granite counter-tops, backsplash, a giant island, full size stainless steel fridge with filtered water access, a gigantic stainless steel BBQ with natural gas (never have to worry about running out of propane), A/C and heat obviously, a private back patio, a basement for storage, two closets and a half bath on the first floor, energy efficient front loaded washer and dryer upstairs. Hardwood floors throughout, and modern style loft feel throughout the entire house.
The average row-home in Philadelphia is 10-12 feet wide, this place is double that at 23 feet wide. So you don't get that cramped row-home feeling you get in all the other places in Philadelphia. It really is quite the unique and special spot! You have to see it to get the full appreciation. Total square footage is just shy of 2,000 square feet. More pictures will be uploaded this weekend, please contact me via email to set up a time to view and with any questions. I'll have select viewing times on New Years Weekend (12/30 and 12/31), and then the Monday and Tuesday (1/2 and 1/3).
Now onto the boring stuff: Rent is $3750 per month plus all utilities excluding water. Two-year minimum rental, a longer duration can be discussed. First and last months rent due at lease signing. This is a no-smoking and no-pet property. Family preferred. Each tenant over the age of 18 will be required to complete a background check prior to signing of lease agreement (link will be provided for completion). If approved to move in, cost for background check will be deducted from first month's rent.
I am looking for a family or group of professionals with a good employment history, financially stable, and has a good history with previous renting with references. Ideally, a family that places a high importance on being respectful, courteous, clean and laid back. If you are interested, please email me with some information about yourself and we will set up a time to talk. Any questions please ask, thanks for taking the time to read consider my home to rent.

title: Such a great place to live! Brewerytown 2 bed 1 bath home with yard!
description:
2832 W Stiles St > Available February 6th, 2023
Newly renovated home in Brewerytown!
This 2 bed 1 bath house is located in the Brewerytown section of Philadelphia (just north of Fairmount/Art Museum area near 29th & Girard). Brewerytown is rich in history, full of character, and quickly developing with cool new restaurants, coffee shops, and convenient shopping. This is a prime location with easy access to highways (76/676/95 and Kelly/Lincoln Drive), public transportation, Center City, the Philadelphia Art Museum, Fairmount Park, and Boathouse Row! Great for runners, bikers, hikers to use the trails along the river.
This gorgeous 2 bedroom 1 bath home is sleek, modern and upscale design throughout. Complete with central air and heat, stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, stove, microwave, and refrigerator. Lovely dark brown hardwood floors throughout, great lighting, granite countertops, good kitchen cabinet space, washer/dryer, and outdoor space!
Overall a must-see unit!

title: Welcome to 1217 Spring Garden! This five-story building
description:
Welcome to 1217 Spring Garden! This five-story building, the first reinforced concrete structure in the city, began life towards the end of the 19th century as the home of the Bilgram Machine Works and was later converted into this uniquely designed loft-style building featuring 40 units in its entirety. Each unit with its DNA and original structure! As you enter the building using its smart building access controls, you’ll find a lobby designed to both pay homage to the building’s 19th-century industrial past and add some 21st-century gloss. You’ll also take notice of its wheelchair accessibility and the new elevator in the former freight elevator shaft. minimal room is also located in the main lobby for convenience. Take a ride up to the 4th floor where you’ll find unit 408. Walk right into the original industrial DNA design including its original hardwood flooring, loft, and brick-exposed walls. You’ll surely take notice of its high ceiling and solid structure! As you move along you’ll find a large kitchen with plenty of cabinet storage and all of your essential appliances and your two nicely sized bedrooms. Your master bedroom includes a large closet and master bath! Make sure you stop by the fitness center and bicycle + skateboard storage room located on level B. Enjoy the tour!
1217-35 Spring Garden St #408

title: LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION! Feast your eyes on a gorgeous!
description:
Feast your eyes on a gorgeous, fully renovated 1867 Queen Anne Italianate carriage house situated on a quiet, well-maintained block in the heart of Fairmount! This home provides city living at its finest, includes a one car garage with extra storage and two private decks. Enter through a classic foyer with 2 stunning mahogany doors. The open floor plan boasts a well-appointed gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, a walk-in pantry, and a large breakfast bar area. Completing the first floor of this home are the dining room, a spacious family room, a powder room, a laundry area, and the garage with original blue slate flooring. The second floor includes a spacious living area with gorgeous hardwood flooring and a wood-burning fireplace for those cozy fall and winter evenings and two well-appointed en-suite bedrooms, including one bathroom with radiant heated floors and waterfall shower head. The third floor features a sun-filled study with an oversized cupola, beautiful in-laid hardwood floors and French doors, which lead to a large deck area, complete with a pergola, gas connected grill and views of the Art Museum fireworks. The beautiful primary suite includes a spacious walk-in closet, an elegant full bath with heated limestone floors, double vanity, and waterfall shower head and French doors that lead to another private roof deck where you can take in the breathtaking city views! Additional highlights of this home include updated mechanicals - new HVAC and a new water heater, custom millwork, a new roof, and high-end finishes throughout while simultaneously maintaining the original charm and unique character of the home. Located on a desirable, tree-lined street in the heart of the Art Museum area, just steps to Fairmount Park and so many great restaurants and The Barnes. There are also so many indoor and outdoor entertainment options close by like Eastern State Penitentiary, The Met Philadelphia, Boathouse Row, Schuylkill River Trail and so much more. Does this sound like your new home? Schedule your showing today - This charmer will not last long!
1927 Brandywine St
